subtitle: according to Legend dwarka was a
majestic City built by the god Krishna
serving as his Earthly Kingdom this city
rich in wealth and Grandeur is said to
have been submerged by the Sea right
after krishna's departure from the world
intriguingly the myth turned a corner
towards reality with the discovery of
underwater ruins off the coast of
Gujarat India archaeological excavations
led by Marine archaeologists have
Unearthed a series of artifacts and
remnants of a city submerged Beneath the
Sea these findings include stone
structures pottery and other materials
dating back thousands of years aligning
with the timeline of the dwarka
described in ancient texts this
discovery has sparked a blend of
excitement and debate among historians
and
archeologists
